quests.desc: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First thing I need you to do is to make an effort to take a trip west. That done, pick up the type 3 key from the recliner. With the type 3 key, unlock the type 3 box. And then, open the type 3 box. And then, pick up the cuboid key from the type 3 box inside the bar. Then, make it so that the cuboid chest within the bar is unlocked. And then, ensure that the cuboid chest in the bar is open. After that, take the fly larva from the cuboid chest inside the bar. After you have picked up the fly larva, make an effort to venture east. If you can succeed at that, rest the fly larva on the couch inside the bedchamber. Alright, thanks!
commands: unlock type 3 box with type 3 key
take cuboid key from type 3 box
unlock cuboid chest with cuboid key
take fly larva from cuboid chest
unlock type 3 box with type 3 key
take cuboid key from type 3 box
unlock cuboid chest with cuboid key
take fly larva from cuboid chest

infos.name: bedchamber
infos.desc:
You are in a bedchamber. An usual one. You decide to just list off a complete list of everything you see in the room, because hey, why not?

 You can make out a couch. [if there is something on the s_0]On the couch you can make out [a list of things on the s_0]. Something scurries by right in the corner of your eye. Probably nothing.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0]But the thing is empty, unfortunately. What, you think everything in TextWorld should have stuff on it?[end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: bar
infos.desc:
You've just walked into a bar.

 You can see a cuboid chest.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The cuboid chest contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The cuboid chest is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You can see a type 3 box.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The type 3 box contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] The type 3 box is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] You make out a Microsoft limited edition locker.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The Microsoft limited edition locker contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] The Microsoft limited edition locker is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You lean against the wall, inadvertently pressing a secret button. The wall opens up to reveal a recliner. [if there is something on the s_1]On the recliner you see [a list of things on the s_1].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1]But the thing hasn't got anything on it.[end if] Oh wow! Is that what I think it is? It is! It's a stand. You shudder, but continue examining the stand. The stand is usual.[if there is something on the s_2] On the stand you make out [a list of things on the s_2].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2] Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the stand.[end if]

 There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading north. There is an unguarded exit to the east.

infos.name: scullery
infos.desc:
You are in a scullery. A normal kind of place.



There is an unguarded exit to the east. There is an unguarded exit to the north. There is an unguarded exit to the south. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: bathroom
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a bathroom. An usual one.

 You can make out a bench. [if there is something on the s_3]On the bench you make out [a list of things on the s_3].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3]However, the bench, like an empty bench, has nothing on it.[end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. There is an unblocked exit to the south. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: workshop
infos.desc:
You are in a workshop. An usual kind of place. You begin looking for stuff.



There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: dish-pit
infos.desc:
You arrive in a dish-pit. An ordinary kind of place. You start to take note of what's in the room.

 You smell an intriguing smell, and follow it to a board. [if there is something on the s_4]You see [a list of things on the s_4] on the board.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4]But the thing is empty. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the board.[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. There is an unguarded exit to the south. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: garage
infos.desc:
You've just walked into a garage. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building.

 You see a shelf. The shelf is standard.[if there is something on the s_5] On the shelf you see [a list of things on the s_5].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_5] But there isn't a thing on it. What, you think everything in TextWorld should have stuff on it?[end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the east. There is an unblocked exit to the south. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: bedroom
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in the bedroom.

 You rest your hand against a wall, but you miss the wall and fall onto a suitcase.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The suitcase contains [a list of things in the c_3]. There's something about an object in a room that's just so... TextWorld.[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] The suitcase is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

 You can see a desk. The desk is typical.[if there is something on the s_6] On the desk you can see [a list of things on the s_6].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_6] The desk appears to be empty.[end if]

 There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading south. There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading north. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: lounge
infos.desc:
Well I'll be, you are in the place we're calling the lounge.



 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading east. There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading south. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. There is an unguarded exit to the north. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: vault
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in the vault.

 Oh, great. Here's a coffer. Huh, weird.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The coffer contains [a list of things in the c_4]. You idly wonder how they came up with the name TextWorld for this place. It's pretty fitting.[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] What a letdown! The coffer is empty![end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south.

There is an unguarded exit to the north. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

 There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading south. There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an unguarded exit to the north.

 You make out a Henderson's limited edition box. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the table.[end if] You can see a rack. [if there is something on the s_8]You see [a list of things on the s_8] on the rack. walkthrough: unlock type 3 box with type 3 key
take cuboid key from type 3 box
unlock cuboid chest with cuboid key
take fly larva from cuboid chest

objective: Welcome to another fast paced game of TextWorld! Here is your task for today. First thing I need you to do is to make an effort to travel west. That done, take the type 3 key from the recliner inside the bar. And then, unlock the type 3 box with the type 3 key. And then, open the type 3 box within the bar. After that, take the cuboid key from the type 3 box in the bar. Then, look and see that the cuboid chest is unlocked with the cuboid key. Once you have unlocked the cuboid chest, look and see that the cuboid chest is wide open. After that, retrieve the fly larva from the cuboid chest inside the bar. After stealing the fly larva, attempt to move east. With that done, rest the fly larva on the couch inside the bedchamber. And once you've done that, you win!
